00046 #ifndef _RTAI_NUCLEUS_QUEUE_H
00047 #define _RTAI_NUCLEUS_QUEUE_H
00048 
00049 #include <nucleus/types.h>
00050 
00051 /* Basic element holder */
00052 
00053 typedef struct xnholder {
00054 
00055     struct xnholder *next;
00056     struct xnholder *last;
00057 
00058 } xnholder_t;
00059 
00060 static inline void inith (xnholder_t *holder) {
00061     /* Holding queues are doubly-linked and circular */
00062     holder->last = holder;
00063     holder->next = holder;
00064 }
00065 
00066 static inline void ath (xnholder_t *head,
00067                         xnholder_t *holder) {
00068     /* Inserts the new element right after the heading one  */
00069     holder->last = head;
00070     holder->next = head->next;
00071     holder->next->last = holder;
00072     head->next = holder;
00073 }
00074 
00075 static inline void dth (xnholder_t *holder) {
00076     holder->last->next = holder->next;
00077     holder->next->last = holder->last;
00078 }
00079 
00080 /* Basic element queue */
00081 
00082 typedef struct xnqueue {
00083 
00084     xnholder_t head;
00085     int elems;
00086 #if defined(CONFIG_RTAI_OPT_DEBUG) && defined(CONFIG_SMP)
00087     xnlock_t lock;
00088 #endif /* CONFIG_SMP */
00089 
00090 } xnqueue_t;
00091 
00092 static inline void initq (xnqueue_t *qslot) {
00093     inith(&qslot->head);
00094     qslot->elems = 0;
00095 #if defined(CONFIG_RTAI_OPT_DEBUG) && defined(CONFIG_SMP)
00096     xnlock_init(&qslot->lock);
00097 #endif
00098 }
00099 
00100 #ifdef CONFIG_RTAI_OPT_DEBUG
00101 
00102 #define XENO_DEBUG_CHECK_QUEUE() \
00103 do { \
00104     xnholder_t *curr; \
00105     spl_t s; \
00106     int nelems = 0; \
00107     xnlock_get_irqsave(&qslot->lock,s); \
00108     curr = qslot->head.last; \
00109     while (curr != &qslot->head && nelems < qslot->elems) \
00110         curr = curr->last, nelems++; \
00111     if (curr != &qslot->head || nelems != qslot->elems) \
00112         xnpod_fatal("corrupted queue, qslot->elems=%d, qslot=%p", \
00113                     qslot->elems, \
00114                     qslot); \
00115     xnlock_put_irqrestore(&qslot->lock,s); \
00116 } while(0)
00117 
00118 #define XENO_DEBUG_INSERT_QUEUE() \
00119 do { \
00120     xnholder_t *curr; \
00121     spl_t s; \
00122     xnlock_get_irqsave(&qslot->lock,s); \
00123     curr = qslot->head.last; \
00124     while (curr != &qslot->head && holder != curr) \
00125         curr = curr->last; \
00126     if (curr == holder) \
00127         xnpod_fatal("inserting element twice, holder=%p, qslot=%p", \
00128                     holder, \
00129                     qslot); \
00130     if (holder->last == NULL)   /* Just a guess. */ \
00131         xnpod_fatal("holder=%p not initialized, qslot=%p", \
00132                     holder, \
00133                     qslot); \
00134     xnlock_put_irqrestore(&qslot->lock,s); \
00135 } while(0)
00136 
00137 #define XENO_DEBUG_REMOVE_QUEUE() \
00138 do { \
00139     xnholder_t *curr; \
00140     spl_t s; \
00141     xnlock_get_irqsave(&qslot->lock,s); \
00142     curr = qslot->head.last; \
00143     while (curr != &qslot->head && holder != curr) \
00144         curr = curr->last; \
00145     if (curr == &qslot->head) \
00146         xnpod_fatal("removing non-linked element, holder=%p, qslot=%p", \
00147                     holder, \
00148                     qslot); \
00149     xnlock_put_irqrestore(&qslot->lock,s); \
00150 } while(0)
00151 #endif /* CONFIG_RTAI_OPT_DEBUG */
00152 
00153 static inline int insertq (xnqueue_t *qslot,
00154                            xnholder_t *head,
00155                            xnholder_t *holder) {
00156     /* Insert the <holder> element before <head> */
00157 #ifdef CONFIG_RTAI_OPT_DEBUG
00158     XENO_DEBUG_CHECK_QUEUE();
00159     XENO_DEBUG_INSERT_QUEUE();
00160 #endif /*CONFIG_RTAI_OPT_DEBUG */
00161     ath(head->last,holder);
00162     return ++qslot->elems;
00163 }
00164 
00165 static inline int prependq (xnqueue_t *qslot,
00166                             xnholder_t *holder) {
00167     /* Prepend the element to the queue */
00168 #ifdef CONFIG_RTAI_OPT_DEBUG
00169     XENO_DEBUG_CHECK_QUEUE();
00170     XENO_DEBUG_INSERT_QUEUE();
00171 #endif /* CONFIG_RTAI_OPT_DEBUG */
00172     ath(&qslot->head,holder);
00173     return ++qslot->elems;
00174 }
00175 
00176 static inline int appendq (xnqueue_t *qslot,
00177                            xnholder_t *holder) {
00178     /* Append the element to the queue */
00179 #ifdef CONFIG_RTAI_OPT_DEBUG
00180     XENO_DEBUG_CHECK_QUEUE();
00181     XENO_DEBUG_INSERT_QUEUE();
00182 #endif /* CONFIG_RTAI_OPT_DEBUG */
00183     ath(qslot->head.last,holder);
00184     return ++qslot->elems;
00185 }
00186 
00187 static inline int removeq (xnqueue_t *qslot,
00188                            xnholder_t *holder) {
00189 #ifdef CONFIG_RTAI_OPT_DEBUG
00190     XENO_DEBUG_CHECK_QUEUE();
00191     XENO_DEBUG_REMOVE_QUEUE();
00192 #endif /* CONFIG_RTAI_OPT_DEBUG */
00193     dth(holder);
00194     return --qslot->elems;
00195 }
00196 
00197 static inline xnholder_t *getheadq (xnqueue_t *qslot) {
00198     xnholder_t *holder = qslot->head.next;
00199     if (holder == &qslot->head) return NULL;
00200     return holder;
00201 }
00202 
00203 static inline xnholder_t *getq (xnqueue_t *qslot) {
00204     xnholder_t *holder = getheadq(qslot);
00205     if (holder) removeq(qslot,holder);
00206     return holder;
00207 }
00208 
00209 static inline xnholder_t *nextq (xnqueue_t *qslot,
00210                                  xnholder_t *holder) {
00211     xnholder_t *nextholder = holder->next;
00212     return nextholder == &qslot->head ? NULL : nextholder;
00213 }
00214 
00215 static inline xnholder_t *popq (xnqueue_t *qslot,
00216                                 xnholder_t *holder) {
00217     xnholder_t *nextholder = nextq(qslot,holder);
00218     removeq(qslot,holder);
00219     return nextholder;
00220 }
00221 
00222 static inline int countq (xnqueue_t *qslot) {
00223     return qslot->elems;
00224 }
00225 
00226 static inline int moveq (xnqueue_t *dstq, xnqueue_t *srcq) {
00227     
00228     xnholder_t *headsrc = srcq->head.next;
00229     xnholder_t *tailsrc = srcq->head.last->last;
00230     xnholder_t *headdst = &dstq->head;
00231 
00232     headsrc->last->next = tailsrc->next;
00233     tailsrc->next->last = headsrc->last;
00234     headsrc->last = headdst;
00235     tailsrc->next = headdst->next;
00236     headdst->next->last = tailsrc;
00237     headdst->next = headsrc;
00238     dstq->elems += srcq->elems;
00239     srcq->elems = 0;
00240 
00241     return dstq->elems;
00242 }
00243 
00244 /* Prioritized element holder */
00245 
00246 typedef struct xnpholder {
00247 
00248     xnholder_t plink;
00249     int prio;
00250 
00251 } xnpholder_t;
00252 
00253 static inline void initph (xnpholder_t *holder) {
00254     inith(&holder->plink);
00255     /* Priority is set upon queue insertion */
00256 }
00257 
00258 /* Prioritized element queue */
00259 
00260 #define xnqueue_up   (-1)
00261 #define xnqueue_down   1
00262 
00263 typedef struct xnpqueue {
00264 
00265     xnqueue_t pqueue;
00266     int qdir;
00267 
00268 } xnpqueue_t;
00269 
00270 static inline void initpq (xnpqueue_t *pqslot,
00271                            int qdir) {
00272     initq(&pqslot->pqueue);
00273     pqslot->qdir = qdir;
00274 }
00275 
00276 static inline int insertpq (xnpqueue_t *pqslot,
00277                             xnpholder_t *head,
00278                             xnpholder_t *holder) {
00279     /* Insert the <holder> element before <head> */
00280     return insertq(&pqslot->pqueue,&head->plink,&holder->plink);
00281 }
00282 
00283 static inline int insertpqf (xnpqueue_t *pqslot,
00284                              xnpholder_t *holder,
00285                              int prio) {
00286 
00287     /* Insert the element at the end of its priority group (FIFO) */
00288 
00289     xnholder_t *curr;
00290 
00291     if (pqslot->qdir == xnqueue_down) {
00292         for (curr = pqslot->pqueue.head.last;
00293              curr != &pqslot->pqueue.head; curr = curr->last) {
00294                 if (prio <= ((xnpholder_t *)curr)->prio)
00295                     break;
00296         }
00297     }
00298     else {
00299         for (curr = pqslot->pqueue.head.last;
00300              curr != &pqslot->pqueue.head; curr = curr->last) {
00301                 if (prio >= ((xnpholder_t *)curr)->prio)
00302                     break;
00303         }
00304     }
00305 
00306     holder->prio = prio;
00307 
00308     return insertq(&pqslot->pqueue,curr->next,&holder->plink);
00309 }
00310 
00311 static inline int insertpql (xnpqueue_t *pqslot,
00312                              xnpholder_t *holder,
00313                              int prio) {
00314 
00315     /* Insert the element at the front of its priority group (LIFO) */
00316 
00317     xnholder_t *curr;
00318 
00319     if (pqslot->qdir == xnqueue_down) {
00320         for (curr = pqslot->pqueue.head.next;
00321              curr != &pqslot->pqueue.head; curr = curr->next) {
00322                 if (prio >= ((xnpholder_t *)curr)->prio)
00323                     break;
00324         }
00325     }
00326     else {
00327         for (curr = pqslot->pqueue.head.next;
00328              curr != &pqslot->pqueue.head; curr = curr->next) {
00329                 if (prio <= ((xnpholder_t *)curr)->prio)
00330                     break;
00331         }
00332     }
00333 
00334     holder->prio = prio;
00335 
00336     return insertq(&pqslot->pqueue,curr,&holder->plink);
00337 }
00338 
00339 static inline xnpholder_t *findpqh (xnpqueue_t *pqslot,
00340                                     int prio) {
00341 
00342     /* Find the element heading a given priority group */
00343 
00344     xnholder_t *curr;
00345 
00346     if (pqslot->qdir == xnqueue_down) {
00347         for (curr = pqslot->pqueue.head.next;
00348              curr != &pqslot->pqueue.head; curr = curr->next) {
00349                 if (prio >= ((xnpholder_t *)curr)->prio)
00350                     break;
00351         }
00352     }
00353     else {
00354         for (curr = pqslot->pqueue.head.next;
00355              curr != &pqslot->pqueue.head; curr = curr->next) {
00356                 if (prio <= ((xnpholder_t *)curr)->prio)
00357                     break;
00358         }
00359     }
00360 
00361     if (curr && ((xnpholder_t *)curr)->prio == prio)
00362         return (xnpholder_t *)curr;
00363 
00364     return NULL;
00365 }
00366 
00367 static inline int appendpq (xnpqueue_t *pqslot,
00368                             xnpholder_t *holder) {
00369     holder->prio = 0;
00370     return appendq(&pqslot->pqueue,&holder->plink);
00371 }
00372 
00373 static inline int prependpq (xnpqueue_t *pqslot,
00374                              xnpholder_t *holder) {
00375     holder->prio = 0;
00376     return prependq(&pqslot->pqueue,&holder->plink);
00377 }
00378 
00379 static inline int removepq (xnpqueue_t *pqslot,
00380                             xnpholder_t *holder) {
00381     return removeq(&pqslot->pqueue,&holder->plink);
00382 }
00383 
00384 static inline xnpholder_t *getheadpq (xnpqueue_t *pqslot) {
00385     return (xnpholder_t *)getheadq(&pqslot->pqueue);
00386 }
00387 
00388 static inline xnpholder_t *nextpq (xnpqueue_t *pqslot,
00389                                    xnpholder_t *holder) {
00390     return (xnpholder_t *)nextq(&pqslot->pqueue,&holder->plink);
00391 }
00392 
00393 static inline xnpholder_t *getpq (xnpqueue_t *pqslot) {
00394     return (xnpholder_t *)getq(&pqslot->pqueue);
00395 }
00396 
00397 static inline xnpholder_t *poppq (xnpqueue_t *pqslot,
00398                                   xnpholder_t *holder) {
00399     return (xnpholder_t *)popq(&pqslot->pqueue,&holder->plink);
00400 }
00401 
00402 static inline int countpq (xnpqueue_t *pqslot) {
00403     return countq(&pqslot->pqueue);
00404 }
00405 
00406 /* Generic prioritized element holder */
00407 
00408 typedef struct xngholder {
00409 
00410     xnpholder_t glink;
00411     void *data;
00412 
00413 } xngholder_t;
00414 
00415 static inline void initgh (xngholder_t *holder, void *data) {
00416     inith(&holder->glink.plink);
00417     holder->data = data;
00418 }
00419 
00420 /* Generic element queue */
00421 
00422 typedef struct xngqueue {
00423 
00424     xnpqueue_t gqueue;
00425     xnqueue_t *freehq;
00426     void (*starvation)(xnqueue_t *);
00427     int threshold;
00428 
00429 } xngqueue_t;
00430 
00431 static inline void initgq (xngqueue_t *gqslot,
00432                            xnqueue_t *freehq,
00433                            void (*starvation)(xnqueue_t *),
00434                            int threshold,
00435                            int qdir) {
00436     initpq(&gqslot->gqueue,qdir);
00437     gqslot->freehq = freehq;
00438     gqslot->starvation = starvation;
00439     gqslot->threshold = threshold;
00440 }
00441 
00442 static inline xngholder_t *allocgh (xngqueue_t *gqslot) {
00443 
00444     if (countq(gqslot->freehq) < gqslot->threshold)
00445         gqslot->starvation(gqslot->freehq);
00446 
00447     return (xngholder_t *)getq(gqslot->freehq);
00448 }
00449 
00450 static inline void *removegh (xngqueue_t *gqslot,
00451                               xngholder_t *holder) {
00452     removepq(&gqslot->gqueue,&holder->glink);
00453     appendq(gqslot->freehq,&holder->glink.plink);
00454     return holder->data;
00455 }
00456 
00457 static inline int insertgqf (xngqueue_t *gqslot,
00458                              void *data,
00459                              int prio) {
00460     xngholder_t *holder = allocgh(gqslot);
00461     holder->data = data;
00462     return insertpqf(&gqslot->gqueue,&holder->glink,prio);
00463 }
00464 
00465 static inline int insertgql (xngqueue_t *gqslot,
00466                              void *data,
00467                              int prio) {
00468     xngholder_t *holder = allocgh(gqslot);
00469     holder->data = data;
00470     return insertpql(&gqslot->gqueue,&holder->glink,prio);
00471 }
00472 
00473 static inline int appendgq (xngqueue_t *gqslot,
00474                             void *data) {
00475     xngholder_t *holder = allocgh(gqslot);
00476     holder->data = data;
00477     return appendpq(&gqslot->gqueue,&holder->glink);
00478 }
00479 
00480 static inline int prependgq (xngqueue_t *gqslot,
00481                              void *data) {
00482     xngholder_t *holder = allocgh(gqslot);
00483     holder->data = data;
00484     return prependpq(&gqslot->gqueue,&holder->glink);
00485 }
00486 
00487 static inline xngholder_t *getheadgq (xngqueue_t *gqslot) {
00488     return (xngholder_t *)getheadpq(&gqslot->gqueue);
00489 }
00490 
00491 static inline xngholder_t *nextgq (xngqueue_t *gqslot,
00492                                    xngholder_t *holder) {
00493     return (xngholder_t *)nextpq(&gqslot->gqueue,&holder->glink);
00494 }
00495 
00496 static inline void *getgq (xngqueue_t *gqslot) {
00497     xngholder_t *holder = getheadgq(gqslot);
00498     if (!holder) return NULL;
00499     appendq(gqslot->freehq,&getpq(&gqslot->gqueue)->plink);
00500     return holder->data;
00501 }
00502 
00503 static inline xngholder_t *popgq (xngqueue_t *gqslot,
00504                                   xngholder_t *holder) {
00505     xngholder_t *nextholder = nextgq(gqslot,holder);
00506     removegh(gqslot,holder);
00507     return nextholder;
00508 }
00509 
00510 static inline xngholder_t *findgq (xngqueue_t *gqslot,
00511                                    void *data) {
00512     xnholder_t *holder;
00513 
00514     for (holder = gqslot->gqueue.pqueue.head.next;
00515          holder != &gqslot->gqueue.pqueue.head; holder = holder->next) {
00516          if (((xngholder_t *)holder)->data == data)
00517              return (xngholder_t *)holder;
00518         }
00519 
00520     return NULL;
00521 }
00522 
00523 static inline void *removegq (xngqueue_t *gqslot,
00524                               void *data) {
00525     xngholder_t *holder = findgq(gqslot,data);
00526     return holder ? removegh(gqslot,holder) : NULL;
00527 }
00528 
00529 static inline int countgq (xngqueue_t *gqslot) {
00530     return countpq(&gqslot->gqueue);
00531 }
00532 
00533 #endif /* !_RTAI_NUCLEUS_QUEUE_H */
